## Summary
- _What changed?_ Provide a short feature/fix description.
- _Why?_ Link Jira/GitHub issue when possible.

## Testing
- [ ] Backend: `mvn test`
- [ ] Frontend: `npm test` (or targeted command)
- [ ] Smoke tested locally (`curl` commands in README)

## Additional Checks
- [ ] Added/updated documentation
- [ ] Updated API contract (if endpoint shape changed)
- [ ] Ensured secrets/config are not exposed in the frontend
